org.apache.james.queue.file

Class FileMailQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.queue.file.FileMailQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailQueue, ManageableMailQueue

    public class FileMailQueue
extends Object
implements ManageableMailQueue
    ManageableMailQueue implementation which use the fs to store Mail's On create of the FileMailQueue the init() will get called. This takes care of load the needed meta-data into memory for fast access.

           TimeUnit unit)
             throws MailQueue.MailQueueException
        Description copied from interface: MailQueue

      • deQueue

        public MailQueue.MailQueueItem deQueue()
                                throws MailQueue.MailQueueException
        Description copied from interface: MailQueue
        Dequeue the next ready-to-process Mail of the queue. This method will block until a Mail is ready and then process the operation. Implementations should take care todo some kind of transactions to not loose any mail on error
        Specified by:
        deQueue in interface MailQueue
        Throws:
        MailQueue.MailQueueException
